data.message: BrandForge: Implement S3/R2 storage with local fallback: Created worker/storage.ts with S3-compatible client (AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO). Graceful fallback to local temp/renders in dev. Renderer uploads after capture, stores HTTPS URL or local path in outputUrl. Image API endpoint auto-redirects for remote URLs, streams for local. Path traversal protection added.
data.task: BrandForge: Implement S3/R2 storage with local fallback
data.outcome: Created worker/storage.ts with S3-compatible client (AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO). Graceful fallback to local temp/renders in dev. Renderer uploads after capture, stores HTTPS URL or local path in outputUrl. Image API endpoint auto-redirects for remote URLs, streams for local. Path traversal protection added.
